description: Dataset with admission-related factors for graduate applicants, including test scores, GPA, and chance of admission.

columns.description: Graduate Record Examination score of the applicant.
Test of English as a Foreign Language score of the applicant.
Strength of the applicants Statement of Purpose (scale 1-5).
Strength of the applicants Letters of Recommendation (scale 1-5).
Cumulative Grade Point Average of the applicant on a 10-point scale.
Indicates whether the applicant has research experience (0 = No, 1 = Yes).
Probability of admission, expressed as a decimal between 0 and 1.
